mean_cn: n.犯罪，冒犯，过错，触怒，犯规（读作/əˈfɛns/）
mean_en: an illegal act; the act of upsetting or insulting somebody; the members of a team whose main aim is to score points against the other team; a method of attack
sentence: The dog takes offense at its owner and looks angry.
sentence_trans: 狗狗被主人惹恼了，看起来十分生气。
